caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain foreign entities.
undersanding:
Summary (under 80 words):
This bill prohibits entities from designated countries that pose national security risks (as identified by U.S. Intelligence) from purchasing real property in Texas. This affects Chinese entities since China is consistently listed in Annual Threat Assessments. The prohibition applies to governmental entities, organizations headquartered in designated countries, or those controlled by such governments. The Attorney General can enforce this through court action and appoint receivers to manage/sell violating properties.

中文翻译：
该法案禁止来自被美国情报机构认定为对国家安全构成风险的指定国家的实体购买德克萨斯州的房地产。由于中国在年度威胁评估中被持续列入，这项法案将影响中国的政府实体、总部位于中国的组织或受中国政府控制的组织。州检察长可以通过法院执行该法案，并任命接管人管理/出售违规房产。

Most likely committees:

2. Business & Commerce Committee
